official-title.#text:
To authorize the acquisition of core battlefield land at
		  Champion Hill, Port Gibson, and Raymond for addition to Vicksburg National
		  Military Park.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Champion Hill, Port Gibson, and
			 Raymond Battlefields Addition Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: (referred to in this Act as the

quote.#tail:
) may acquire

for the Port Gibson Unit, the Champion Hill Unit, and

in Port Gibson, as generally depicted on the map entitled

quote.#text:
Vicksburg
			 National Military Park–Proposed Battlefield Additions

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
by donation, purchase from a willing seller with donated or

			 Mississippi or any political subdivisions of the State may be acquired only by

text.#text: Land and interests in land may be acquired under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be on file and

Champion Hill, Port Gibson, and Raymond Battlefields Addition Act/s:2/ss:a

text.#text: On the acquisition of land by the

the acquired land
			 shall be added to Vicksburg National Military Park;

the boundary of
			 the Vicksburg National Military Park shall be adjusted to reflect the
			 acquisition of the land; and

the acquired land
			 shall be administered as part of the Vicksburg National Military Park in
			 accordance with applicable laws (including regulations).
